<MethodEndpoint

  context={"endpoint"}
>

ActivatedHeight queries the height when BTC staking protocol is activated, i.e., the first height when
there exists 1 finality provider with voting power

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

</RequestSchema>
